product_name: Smith's Adjustable Angle Pull-Thru Knife Sharpener
long_description: Unlike standard sharpeners, Smith's Adjustable Angle Pull-Thru knife sharpener features customizable angles to hone your straight-edge and serrated blades with coarse and fine sharpening stages. Sharpen a wide variety of knives by simply turning the dial to 1 of the 6 available angles to match the original factory grind angle, then pull your knife through the slot. Pull-through design quickly sharpens dull blades and maintains the edge on knives that are already sharp. Smith's Adjustable Angle Pull-Thru knife sharpener features replaceable abrasive components, a soft-grip handle and non-slip rubber feet.
